name: FUSIM
description:
Use Any Image
Browse to any image file on your computer and import it as your target. Image is loaded and automatically resized at runtime.

Give It The Goods

Raising the middle finger of a closed hand triggers the LAUNCH event. Both hands, and optional extending of the thumb are supported.

PC + Steam VR + Leap Motion

Works on Windows 10 with SteamVR Headsets + addition of this sensor. 

More Hand Tracking capable systems to be announced very soon!

For more:
http://FUSIM.mikedopsa.com
http://twitter.com/FUSIMDev
